reviewText: Features four well-endowed blonds as they dance to fiesta music and disrobe. Includes some girl-girl type as they help each other of with their outfit, some pierce and tat. Concludes with an African gal dance and disrobe. Very watchable. Good show, cheaper than the club.
Just read the other reviews and you will find that this DVD delivers a great non-hardcore piece of entertainment! The girls are easy on the eyes and would like to have seen more of them together.

This video may look pretty basic when it comes to the production, but the women are unbelievably hot and seem to be genuinely having a lot of fun. In fact, they almost seem to be having more fun than the viewer, if that's possible! Some of them might make you sweat even if they DIDN'T get naked, but (gulp) they do! If you like erotic videos with beautiful nude women, GET THIS!!!!!!!

This makes for a good dance workout video.  While the pace is not extremely intense, if you do the full hour, you'll be sweating by the end.  And the very beautiful ladies solve the biggest problem that most dance workout videos have - the tendency to get boring.  A great party.

I do not know how they picked the lovely ladies they picked, why they chose Merengue Music for the DVD, or how they integrated so many great effects into one DVD, but they did and l liked it.  I also liked the Latin Jazz song featuring Latin Jazz Guitarist Marco Linares added as a bonus at the end.  I happened to see Marco Linares perform with Rubin Blades at his concert in New York.  If you have an extra [amount], you might think about buying the DVD if for no other reason than the great music.  Ya, that is a good excuse for the wife or girlfriend "you bought it for the music."  Ya sure!
